nodes.documentation:
@title A contract that implements some functions for helping Kibiwoo's managing of products
 @author Álvaro Gericke
nodes.name: KibiwooHelperProducts

nodes.documentation: @notice Withdraws all the balance in the contract back to owner of the contract
nodes.name: withdraw

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct KibiwooRegisterProducts.Product storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: getProductsByShop

nodes.documentation:
@title A contract that implements some functions for helping Kibiwoo's managing of products
 @author Álvaro Gericke
nodes.name: KibiwooHelperProducts

nodes.documentation: @notice Withdraws all the balance in the contract back to owner of the contract
nodes.name: withdraw

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct KibiwooRegisterProducts.Product storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: getProductsByShop

devdoc.author: Álvaro Gericke

addComplement(uint256,string,uint256).details: If no name is assigned, it will be assigned an empty string.

params._name: String identifying the  name of the complement.
params._productId: The unique identifier of the product to which a complement will be added.
params._sku: The 36 digits identifier of the complement to be created.

params._owner: Address of the shop to retrieve the products from it.

getProductsByShop(address).return: An array with all the IDs of the products and their complements owned by that shop

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: A contract that implements some functions for helping Kibiwoo's managing of products

addComplement(uint256,string,uint256).notice: Adds a new complement to the actual product.

getProductsByShop(address).notice: Returns all the products with its complements that are owned by a specific shop.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

withdraw().notice: Withdraws all the balance in the contract back to owner of the contract
